blocked_effective_reputation.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Effective reputation of the blocked file; applied by the sensor when the event occurs

blocked_hash.description: Searchable. MD5 and SHA-256 hash(es) of the child process(es) binary; for any process(es) terminated by the sensor

blocked_name.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Tokenized file path of the files blocked by sensor action
